thread.title: Gosden blow as Jack Hobbs drawn in 12 for Champion
thread.title_full: Gosden blow as Jack Hobbs drawn in 12 for Champion

title: Gosden blow as Jack Hobbs drawn in 12 for Champion
text: Gosden blow as Jack Hobbs drawn in 12 for Champion Thursday, 15 October 2015 (4 seconds ago) JACK HOBBS, the 5-4 favourite for Saturday's Qipco Champion Stakes, has been drawn in stall 12, with stablemate Maverick Wave the only horse outside him. • Jack Hobbs now the 11-8 favourite for Champions Day feature • Gleneagles in great form but needs ground to dry out if he is to run at Ascot Jack Hobbs,... guardian.co.uk 3 days ago - Sports John Gosden believes Jack Hobbs has the tactical speed to justify favouritism in the Group 1 Qipco Champion Stakes at Ascot on Saturday and pinpointed the draw... Racing Post 3 days ago - Sports You Might Like
